title: How to Make a Bed Out of Cushions

steps.headline: Gather your materials.
steps.description:
You'll need the following items:
4 couch cushions, preferably square
2 blankets/covers/sheets
1 small pillow

steps.headline: Place 2 couch cushions on the ground next to each other.
Stack the other 2 couch cushions over them.
steps.description: This will create a nice, soft place to sleep.

steps.headline: Cover the stacked cushions with the two blankets.
steps.description: You can think of this as making your new bed.

steps.headline: Place the pillow down wherever you'd like to place your head.
steps.description: Once you've done this, you've completed your single-person bed.

steps.headline: Gather your materials.
steps.description:
Here's what you'll need to make a larger bed:
4 large couch cushions
2 large blankets
1 large pillow or 2 small pillows

steps.headline: Place all four cushions on the floor to create a 2-by-2 array.
steps.description: This means that you should create a square out of the four cushions.

steps.headline: Cover the cushions with the two large blankets.
steps.description: Make sure you place them on the bed neatly.

steps.headline: Place your 1-2 pillows on the bed wherever you like.
steps.description: Place the pillows down wherever you and your sleeping partner would like to place your heads. After that, you're all done!

text:
Making a Single Person Bed Gather your materials. You'll need the following items:
4 couch cushions, preferably square
2 blankets/covers/sheets
1 small pillow Place 2 couch cushions on the ground next to each other.  Stack the other 2 couch cushions over them. This will create a nice, soft place to sleep. Cover the stacked cushions with the two blankets. You can think of this as making your new bed. Place the pillow down wherever you'd like to place your head. Once you've done this, you've completed your single-person bed. Making a Larger Bed Gather your materials. Here's what you'll need to make a larger bed:
4 large couch cushions
2 large blankets
1 large pillow or 2 small pillows Place all four cushions on the floor to create a 2-by-2 array. This means that you should create a square out of the four cushions. Cover the cushions with the two large blankets. Make sure you place them on the bed neatly. Place your 1-2 pillows on the bed wherever you like. Place the pillows down wherever you and your sleeping partner would like to place your heads. After that, you're all done!
